alert.word_not_in_our_list: Word not found in our list
help_modal.after_each_guess_the_color_wi: After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
help_modal.the_letter_x_is_in_the_correc: The letter {x} is in the word and in the correct spot.
help_modal.the_letter_x_is_in_the_word_b: The letter {x} is in the word but in the wrong spot.
help_modal.the_letter_x_is_not_in_the_wo: The letter {x} is not in the word.
help_modal.palabrio_is_a_clone: Palabrio is a clone of {clonedName}, created because the original only had English words available.
share_game_results.i_guessed_the_word_in: I guessed the word in {n} tries
share_game_results.i_guessed_the_daily_w: I guessed the daily word in {n} tries
share_game_results.i_couldnt_guess_the_d: I couldn't guess the daily word
